title: Converted 2200 Mecha Tokens to 100 Prestige points.. or so i thought
body: It said that the "craft failed"   reload loot tab or try again later..   i reloaded the tab and the tokens are gone (96now), and i got 5(what i already had) prestige points...      help?    reported it already

replies.body: Support ticket, nobody here can help you.
